channel.title: Version 5.18 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 5.18.0 (2023-07-27) Enhancements [feature][change] shortcodes: add more deprecation warnings #598 [feature][change] shortcodes: change context parameter to page if called as partial #595 [feature] siteparam: support nested parameters and text formatting #590 [feature][change] a11y: improve when tabbing through links #581 Fixes [bug] openapi: inherit RTL setting from Hugo content #600 [bug] 404: fix display in RTL #597 [bug] highlight: fix position of copy-to-clipboard button in RTL #594 [bug] openapi: fix spelling #593 [bug] search: fix typo in output format #591 [bug] tabs: fix tab selection by groupid #582 [bug] theme: restore compat with Hugo 0.95.0 #580 [bug][change] theme: improve display of links #577
